name: Alt+TAB
description:
Este es mi primer juego. 

Inspirado en casos de la vida real, es muy básico pero puede ser adictivo.

 Simplemente tu jefe no debe atraparte perdiendo el tiempo. 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is my first game.

The game is inspired by real life cases, it's really basic but maybe it will become an addiction for you.

Your boss just shouldn't catch you wasting your time.
